Package edu.uky.games.physics_game.physics

package edu.uky.games.physics_game.physics
Simulated bodies that move around in a 2D space and change direction when they collide.
  • Related Packages
    Package
    Description
    edu.uky.games.physics_game
    The foundation on which you will build a very simple 2D video game physics engine.
    edu.uky.games.physics_game.collision
    Efficient broad phase collision detection using the popular Sweep and Prune method.
